name: Cardboard Crusaders Beta
description:
Play as Flynn, an imaginative child of 8 in this third-person tower defense game. You’re charged with protecting your cardboard castle when toys come to life. Build and manage towers, while using magic and special attacks to defend your castle from the onslaught of enemy waves. Will Flynn be able to keep the toy monsters at bay and save his creation?


Link for Beta Feedback: 
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc4tqiLlpb8GMeX3D5HBZvpJG_-zGDQ7QIE6e4qP9DqEJ5n9A/viewform?usp=sf_link
